main_definition: An explorer is a person who travels to unfamiliar places in search of new information, discoveries or experiences.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who discovers and investigates unknown territories, regions, or phenomena
meanings_and_examples.example: Marco Polo was an explorer who traveled the Silk Road to Asia in the 13th century.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Someone who studies a particular subject in great depth and detail
meanings_and_examples.example: A biologist is an explorer of the natural world, studying various forms of life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual who examines different aspects or perspectives to gain new understanding
meanings_and_examples.example: The researcher was an explorer in social psychology, trying to understand human behavior and interactions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who actively seeks out knowledge or experiences outside of their comfort zone
meanings_and_examples.example: She embarked on a journey as an explorer of different cultures during her travels around the world.
